website_summaries.verdict: This model is super fast and boasts reliable connectivity, but what makes it stand out is the simplicity of the touch screen setup feature.
pros: The 1900 Mbps of bandwidth is enough to handle the multiple connected devices of the average family, including gaming consoles
Dual band processor means those devices can operate lag-free
Our favorite feature is the hassle-free touch screen setup
Plug the router in, turn it on, and then follow the on-screen instructions
A great router for those who are not especially tech savvy
cons: Resetting the WiFi password requires changing the WiFi name as well

customer_reviews.title: Truly Plug-and-Play
customer_reviews.text: This is the first router that I have purchased that is true plug and play. Set up was virtually instantaneous and was accomplished without a computer. (I love the touchscreen set-up.) It is much faster than my prior router which wasn't that old and so far (albeit just 4 days) has had no freeze-ups or need to reset. Edit: still happy 7 months later. Hasn't needed a reset yet.
customer_reviews.author: EBK

customer_reviews.title: So easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: So I am a Linksys fan and have owned one model or another for the last 10 years. Recently my device worked until the day after the warranty ended and then it started working intermittently. So I checked on line and found this TP-Link AC1900 router onsale and decided to give it a try. So much easier to set up this system and get devices online, and it is a lot quicker than the gigabit router from linksys. the touchscreen display is great and keeps me from getting my laptop out to set up the linksys router. If you are not tech savvy and want quick wireless, give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. I originally bought to use as a bridge
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I originally bought to use as a bridge, but moved to my main router/AP. The screen is incredibly handy. Set up on the spot wherever you want without 192.168.1.1...what a relief! I know it may sound lazy, but to set up everything with an easy GUI right then and there is a delight. I have not ran speed tests yet, but the setup alone is worth a premium.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a self repair ability but pretty solid.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but do need to occasionally reset it, perhaps once every month or every other month. Why can't they make these things self repairing instead of needing a manual reset is beyond me - rock solid performance should be the goal and main purpose, this will get more important as more internet connected devices come about. The screen is nice however only really useful for child controls and guest logon where you have to have a self changing code. Wish also the clock could stay on as a large clock display, or perhaps user definable.
customer_reviews.author: Starchild

customer_reviews.title: awesome product!~
customer_reviews.text: wow what an awesome device~! Firstly i had the one that my cable and internet providers gave with the triple play and what a piece of junk. !!!! To set this monster up took literally one min! super easy and does most of the work for you ! I was confused b/c it was so east and tested it on all my devices in the house just to make sure that it was a good router and it worked. I am in love also with the way it looks ! super nice and sleek . I can say i know why is has great ratings. It does what it says it does!
customer_reviews.author: Loliray

customer_reviews.title: Does not have Bridged and Clients modes ...
customer_reviews.text: Only has three modes. Router, Access Point, and Repeater. I was hoping to get Bridged and Client modes since those two are the hardest to access the settings pages through the web interface especially in random hotspot DHCP environments where you probably won't be able to guess the IP address. Was HOPING that I could access the router settings for those two modes through the display. Anyways, really no need for the display if you can just go through the web interface and see the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tad C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Darn good router
customer_reviews.text: I do believe this is the best router I have ever owned and I have owned quite a few. I am using this router with an ARRIS SURFboard SB6190 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem. The two work very well together. They are Fast and stable ... rock sold. I subscribe to 100Mbps internet. OOKLA Speedtest.net show me consistently running just under 100MBps but I have seen it at 120Mbps at times. I live way out in the boonies ... I am impressed! I also run two WiFi extender/repeaters on is a 300Mbps TP-Link and the other is similar but not TP-Link. Everything works great. MOCA feeds of this for TIVO boxes and TIVO mini's are super reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: and this would seem to be working just fine. So it's not the brand per se
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, it stopped working properly (or at least it was probably the culprit as to why I got continually disconnected from the internet) after some months and had to replace it with the AC1750 TP-Link locally, and this would seem to be working just fine. So it's not the brand per se, but something about the model. I did everything with the help of a technical expert, so it's not that I put my foot into it or anything, I had professional help. The one I have now is simpler, does not have the fancy screen or anything, but it's getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nelida Kreer

customer_reviews.title: So simple, even a caveman could connect.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly simple! Basically plug and play. Superfast speeds, getting the most out of modem, and with the dual channels, I can connect my video streaming to the 5GHZ stream, and keep full speed on the 2.4GHZ channel. So simple, even a caveman could handle it! I love this router.
customer_reviews.author: GRW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and user interface. Outstanding Tech Support!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and user interface. In most cases, user setup should go very well. Range is very good. Main reason for 5 star rating was the excellent tech support received from TP-Link... on a Saturday no less. Long story short, after several attempts the extender would not connect to the router (Netgear Nighthawk X6) on the 2.4 Ghz band. Called tech support (<5 minute hold time) and they actually helped me with a setting on the Netgear router (Wireless>>Wireless Network>>2.4 Ghz b/g/n>>Channel) advising me to change it from "auto" to channel "11". Problem solved. Kudos TP-Link!
customer_reviews.author: Lori and Rob

customer_reviews.title: thinking the user screen would be useful to me
customer_reviews.text: As a router novice, I bought this when I needed a new one, thinking the user screen would be useful to me. I ended up having an expert install it for me. He had quite a lot of trouble getting it setup, though was eventually successful. He also thought the user screen was a gimmick. It seemed to work ok. I ended up upgrading to another router because of a problem I was having with a thermostat connecting to it. I think this issue was unrelated to the TP-Link router, so don’t think this should issue ding the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router, Easy Touchscreen setup
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Super easy to setup! Love the Touchscreen display. It shows the Guest Network with the daily changing password. Not using the Quality of Service feature. The router is doing a great job as it is I have 31 Wifi and 6 wired devices hooked up. 3 Roku, 1 Tivo (my partner is very nostalgic), 1 Smart TV, 1 Vizio Soundbar, 3 Laptops, 3 Echo dots, 1 Echo and 2 cell phones. The rest is smart light bulbs and other smart devices. No slow down or buffering anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: PEterJAyGAndlNAsh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer and left with burnt out unit.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this because the merchant Green Street will not stand by their product. I had this product for 8 months, inside of the PT- Link started on fire and it stopped working. I am so glad was up at 12:30 am to smell the unit burning odor. I reached out PT-Link tech who said they would have replace it but since I purchased on-line through Green St who refused to replace or offer assistance. DON’T BUY SAVE YOUR MONEY! Disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Good Router and Good Wireless signal but the touchscreen is very flaky.
customer_reviews.text: The router works well but the touchscreen (which is the main reason why I bought this one) will sometimes how problems recognizing touches on the on-screen keyboard. Sometimes this is resolved by a reboot and sometimes it needs a factory reset (which is annoying). Thankfully, I've got it set up and I don't really need to change the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy UI glitchy and loses connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this based on the reviews, the reality is it loses connection and as reset to the point of needing to put my password back in on some of my devices, but not all. I contacted their support and they offered to replace it, but why would I want another product of something I'm not happy with. I use my wi-fi for work at home and needed something I could rely on...this wasn't it and I'm out the money
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent router for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router on sale and overall it met most of my expectations. The only issue I have is that the WiFi takes longer to detect on my wireless devices in comparison to my other router, and previous routers I've used. When connected I haven't had any issues with lag or d/c. Haven't needed to reboot the device to fix errors or re-establish Internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice, works really well
customer_reviews.text: Was so easy to setup. Didn’t have to call internet company for support. Was able to set network id and passwords from the touch screen right away and was up and running with phones, tv, and xbox in a half hour. Our tablets automatically connected. I returned the rental router to our ISP this morning for a $10/month savings. The router was confirmed as a factory referb, with a note from tplink in the box and screen looked brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Gigabit fast?  I don't think so
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a dead Lincsys and went looking for a faster router. My ethernet speed is fast and from the router I use Roku and Apple TV. If the description was a reality, there should be no lag in video loads but this thing is no faster than the Lyncsys but it was MUCH EASIER to SETUP. Follow up, this thing is NOT FAST! Pathetic performance.
customer_reviews.author: Western Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and easy set-up. I always plug my router into an ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had zero issues with this router. Very smooth and easy set-up. I always plug my router into an appliance timer and set it to turn off and back on once each day at 3;00 a.m. This is good practice on ANY router and helps chase the gremlins away that can sneak into a router.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time AND money
customer_reviews.text: NOT an easy set up. Tech Dept difficult to deal with if you only speak English !!! The Quick Set up was a major issue starting with step #1 - UNABLE TO CONTINUE INSTALL - TOTAL WASTE OF $186.99 (U.S. DOLLARS) for DEFECTIVE PRODUCT. Not uncommon with Chinese manufactured goods !
customer_reviews.author: elevenken

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality and Functional WIFI Router!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the TP-Link AC1900 Wireless Wi-Fi Gigabit Router with Touch Screen Setup (Touch P5). It is very easy to set up and top quality! I have this set up directly to the cable modem so the signal is 100%.
customer_reviews.author: AnneRobinLives

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: The small extra cost of the LCD panel on this router is more than worth the time saved during just the set-up and it did not require a computer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: The range was also a nice improvement over my last router
customer_reviews.text: I got the touch screen one. It did make it easier to set up. The range was also a nice improvement over my last router. The only thing I didn't like is that it doesn't work with TP-Link's "Tether" app.
customer_reviews.author: Pants

customer_reviews.title: The active display adds nice, but not necessary features to this high performance router.
customer_reviews.text: Superior range in a 6000 ft. 3 level home. Consistent 100+ MBits at the router ports and a minimum of 52 MBits anywhere in my home. The beam forming antennas appear to really work in concentrating the beam in the required direction.
customer_reviews.author: SEinson

customer_reviews.title: Good router. Exceptional features for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good router. Exceptional features for the money. We are very impressed with the guest network, the internal security, the ease of setup, and the continuing excellent operation of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Imbody

customer_reviews.title: The best and the easiest to set up
customer_reviews.text: The best and the easiest to set up. It is so easy that you dont even need instructions.The touch screen works just like an a touched screen computer and or phone Well made. great design and so cool looking. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and Love the onscreen "guest password" feature for when ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the problem is with some saying it is hard to setup - it basically does everything for you! My 5 year old niece could set it up! Looks great and Love the onscreen "guest password" feature for when kid's friends come by or visiting out of town relatives stay over. Just tell them to go tap the router and there it is!
customer_reviews.author: [Redacted] c

customer_reviews.title: Works well for wole house.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use I use it for the whole house 5gb is sensitive but works ok when connected. Over all a good buy best I have used to date for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis T. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Working great !
customer_reviews.text: It's working great. I purchased this to replace a different (Netgear AC1750) router that I recently purchased which gave me nothing but problems. This was easy to set up and has been working flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Gadgets2

customer_reviews.title: Very cool router
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks really cool. Really easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of different devices at one time. All the time and we have never had a problem with it. This was one of the best purchases I have ever made. Not only is it exactly the same signal but it saves me money every month. I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The built-in screen is great, superior performance.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for a few months now. Great performance, easy setup, and love the built-in screen for settings and troubleshooting. I did some before and after speed tests and it blew away my old router: >2x downstream performance boost.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This was not so easy to set up for me. Ended up having to connect my computer to it and finish the install. Now that its up and running we've had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Khomme

customer_reviews.title: This router was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This router was very easy to set up . I never thought I would love a router but I love this one . We have a two story house and the wifi is at full strength through out the house . We have never had one that can accomplish this . I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: lsciarra

customer_reviews.title: Great router for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Wireless routers I have ever used. The setup is easy and the touchscreen works really well. I found that the signal strength is and range is really good. Very satisfied with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Performs well!
customer_reviews.text: Touchscreen makes router easy to program....no need to use an online webpage setup screen.
customer_reviews.author: Pop-pop#1

customer_reviews.title: Great router.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs. You do not need a computer to set it up. Signal strength and speed are great. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jplumbob

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and snazzy looking
customer_reviews.text: This unit puts out enough signal, I could get rid of my extra access point. No problems installing. The touch screen on the unit is ok if you have skinny fingers, but you don't really need to use the touch screen as you can manage it from a connected computer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Great unit easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to setup and looks great. Covers our complete home 3200 sq ft.
customer_reviews.author: GRAHAM HAZLETTE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to review a product if it does the job you bought it for. This does exactly what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Texan2

customer_reviews.title: Nice router
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up, looks great and works well. Just wish the cable connections were at the bottom/front of the router because I hung mine on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I can have a screen on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can have a screen on my router. This router has performed pretty much flawlessly for me. And it wasn't even the one recommended to me by my ISP provider.
customer_reviews.author: maddog5

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Router. Installed with PC turned off due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Router. Installed with PC turned off due to it's touch screen - it works amazingly well - I get reception a half block away even. Love it :) Looks so cool too..... the design is just as great as the functionality
customer_reviews.author: Lee Grube

customer_reviews.title: Easy controls
customer_reviews.text: I love this router can turn signal off instantly if I need to get my daughters attention lol
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, excellent touchscreen functionality.  Great choice for low-tech buyers.
customer_reviews.text: The touchscreen works very well, saving the trouble of direct-wiring a laptop to configure the router. Wireless signal is decent and everything works as described. I'm glad I chose this model and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmznCust

customer_reviews.title: Solved my speed issue.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii and high speed service is not really high speed as the local cable company uses cheap routers. This router solved my problem and gave me way more speed!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Owens

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up works perfect excellent range. Haven't had a single problem with it. Love to touch screen
customer_reviews.author: John no

customer_reviews.title: No Support, Warranty Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 4 months, then nothing. The port on the back stopped recognizing that there was a cable plugged in. Of course this was one month after the support window closed on Amazon. TP-Link has a support number. I called and after 4 hours (yes) the tech told me that my home network was totally mis-configured and it had nothing to do with their hardware. He said that I needed to have a technician come in and install a firewall. He tried to switch me to a paid support line even though the router is "supposedly" still under warranty. They DO NOT support their product and the warranty is not worth the paper it is printed on. STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: HOWARD W FULP JR

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly router
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this router. I appreciate the screen that makes it easy to set up wifi and create multiple networks with different passwords. The touch screen is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger Dog

customer_reviews.title: No Compromise Router
customer_reviews.text: Rock Solid. Insanely Easy to Setup. Advanced features everywhere. Looks fantastic. Reception is insane.
customer_reviews.author: Ellenbogen

customer_reviews.title: which is mildly annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Solid router. Have had it for six months - it works very well and I have only had to reboot it twice. Only down side is lack of stylus - I am often "fat-fingering" the passwords, which is mildly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaRob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the best router I have ever bought I highly recommend it the touch screen is responsive and very easy to set up just an amazing value at the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best router I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this a/c router. The one router covers my whole house (3 floors) with the 2.4 GHz radio. The 5 GHz radio is more limited in range as expected. Love the touch screen for set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Collector

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This router was extremely easy to set up and we now have an outstanding WiFi signal from our second story down to our basement. Very pleased with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: but it is easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. Still not getting range with it, but it is easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: rokrobin

customer_reviews.title: Great product it is very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Great product it is very easy to setup. This is the third one that I have purchased and have had no problems with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Wade James

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: This router is very easy to setup without using a computer to setup. The only limitation is some of the advanced settings of the router that are easier if a computer is used.
customer_reviews.author: Alan's Computer Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fairly easy to setup. Offers many advanced features that will be beyond most novices so take some time with the manual and online tutorials.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It started great. Very fast
customer_reviews.text: It started great. Very fast, steady and I liked it. However, it failed right after the warranty time just like it meant to be. Sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: We all Love this router
customer_reviews.text: We all Love this router! It pushes all 4 tv's with wi-fi on one of them and Roku's on the other 3 as well as our wi-fi on our phones. We are very pleased with this router! I no longer have to go into my phone and cut wi-fi off so that I can watch Netflix ! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for ease of use and high performance.
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for the price. Met and exceeded expectations. I pair this seamlessly with a repeater by TP link and it was the best solution I believe available fory set up. My building has a lot of steel and concrete and this router was not only easy to set up due to simplistic touch screens sign it was so powerful in fact that the repeater was hardly needed.
customer_reviews.author: Uk'nDude

customer_reviews.title: A Great and Easy Router to Use
customer_reviews.text: A great and easy router to use. It just sux my internet service is crappy. (unfortunately had to return)
customer_reviews.author: P.D. Kelchner

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to set up and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up and it works great. I had dreaded doing the set up, but it was literally less than 15 minutes.This is a little pricey, but the ease of set up and great signal is worth it, especially if you are in a bigger home with lots of users.
customer_reviews.author: BruceB

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This router seems to be doing everything we had hoped it would do. It gets a longer range and the signal is very strong. We are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: super fast perfect range and super super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: outstanding router, super fast perfect range and super super easy to setup. and the LCD looks and works like a champ. oh and the router looks like a piece of art. well done TP-Link
customer_reviews.author: Joe Max

customer_reviews.title: ... makes life a lot easier I should about something like this a long time ago and yes you can ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes life a lot easier I should about something like this a long time ago and yes you can log into your computer and access all the same information but this is just a touch away and I like it
customer_reviews.author: just saying

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy and the ability to set it up without having ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy and the ability to set it up without having to connect it to a computer is a great feature. The range is great covering my entire house. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up with great speed throughout the house
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I love that the guest pwd changes everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love that the guest pwd changes everyday. I wish it had a "learn" button. It works perfectly, and the range is much greater than is advertized!
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: This is the best and easiest setup on a wireless router I ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and easiest setup on a wireless router I ever purchased. It covers my whole house even into the garage with the door closed. Really fast too wireless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario A. Rillon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: OMG this router is amazing we have a 2600sqft home and connection now is ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG this router is amazing we have a 2600sqft home and connection now is no issue. I really like how you can select which GHZ you want to join to a particular device. Excellent product this replaced our Asus.
customer_reviews.author: Wrencher-Andrus

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was great until today, less than a year later, it’s dead
customer_reviews.author: anthony gagliardo

customer_reviews.title: Best router on the market right now...
customer_reviews.text: Best router on the market right now... Powerful + Easy to Configure. Fantastic screen & interface. 5 min to complete a full setup, with 2.4 & 5 Ghz bands, and total coverage in my home: No other router could achieve this coverage before. Also, it works in any configuration... As router, repeater, wireless hub... I also like the Almond Router, but this one is even better. Seriously, this is the best wireless router in the market today, for any normal or expert user. It's very easy to use, but a very powerful an reliable device.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device gives you amazing Wi Fi coverage in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Judy

customer_reviews.title: Non functional 5Ghz wireless.
customer_reviews.text: I think they have a bad batch. The 5 Ghz wireless was completely non-functional. The unit thought it was on, but none of our Iphones or Ipads could see it. I see a few other recent reviews complaining of no wireless and it makes me think maybe there was a bad production batch. TP-Link really needs to look into this. For now, I say just stay away for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Nunamaker

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good router. Super easy to set up. I had no problems with figuring everything out and I'm just a college student who has never set up a router in my life. I was willing to pay the higher price for the ease of access and the familiar apple-like touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and looks good anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Took me maybe 3-5 minutes to setup, and not only is my connection faster, but the signal reaches really far! It looks good just about anywhere you put it if you manage your cables neatly. No heat issues which is a problem I saw with other reviews on other routers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The setup with the screen is nice. The ability to have a guest password on ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. I get lots of disconnects when streaming data at the high speed. Low speed is not connecting for most of the devices we use. I ordered a cheap TP-Link N450 for the slow and this MUCH cheaper device outperforms the AC1900. It is a shame I had disposed of the box it came in or I would have returned it. The setup with the screen is nice. The ability to have a guest password on the screen that can update automatically is a good idea for certain locations. if it performed properly I would have been happy, this one is a expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Perry in CT

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 36 days
customer_reviews.text: While it worked well for a while. This piece of junk lasted exactly 36 days. The features are great and it was super fast but it lost the ability to connect to the Internet or be managed. Even a factory reset was not able to bring it back to functionality. This happened just outside the standard Amazon return windows so I will have the additional joy of dealing with the vendor to return this thing.
customer_reviews.author: GalvezGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Router
customer_reviews.text: My cable guide said this was a great router and he would know!
customer_reviews.author: BSis2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Range, Easy setup, Fast WIFI and Beauty! Not sure if it last.
customer_reviews.author: VQT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Really solved our failing router problem. The GUI is a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Chaney III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Needed upgrade to replace older Cisco . Very easy to set up and use .

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the printer connection to work on this router and TP-Link provided the worst tech support I've ever received for an out-of-the-box product. So, I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed how easy the setup was on time delivery will order again

customer_reviews.title: Coolest router ever! Even the installers who set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Coolest router ever! Even the installers who set up my internet service were impressed by the ease in which they could set up the dual band, assign passwords, guest access, etc. Connects all of my devices instantly and quickly, with no disruptions.

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you're only planning on using a router ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted Almost exactly 2 years and then completely died. Will not turn on at all. Great product if you're only planning on using a router for 2 years and then throwing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mdub1

customer_reviews.title: One Awesome Device!
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome device. I love not having to connect via wire for initial config! My kids were initially fiddling with it, but a simple admin password stops them in their tracks from doing anything.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have had zero issues. Easy to set up, I would recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and able to stream HD channels and work online at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyTN

customer_reviews.title: Working great.
customer_reviews.text: So far works great. It was easy to set up with no need to have it hooked up to a desktop. All the set up was done on the touch screen. Having a guest sign in was also easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Oren H.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: The range doesn't reach far. It has been gradually getting worse with the signal and losing connection to my devices. I thought it was my connection until I tried another router, turns out this router has been my problem. I highly recommend a different router, it's unfortunate that I spent so much and got very little in return. The great reviews is what lured me in, so hopefully I can help someone else to choose a better router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great new wifi router.

customer_reviews.title: This router is wonderful! Quite easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This router is wonderful! Quite easy to install, hot smoking looks, good wifi range and consistent dual-band signal. I can finally use 5G on every corner of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kenyi A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent router setup was less then 10 mins
customer_reviews.text: Excellent router setup was less then 10 mins. I upgraded from my netgear router and my speeds went up to 181 DL on the 5g network. 2.4 I am getting around 50-55 DL speeds. There can be a little lag when using the touch screen on the router other then that this is by far my best router I brought.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Had this router for several monhs. One of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this router for several monhs. One of the antennas was loose but besides that it works as expected (which means it works great).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. I configured mine for 5G so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. I configured mine for 5G so I could play some intense games like Doom. I would recommend this router to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Johnson

product_meta.title: TP-Link AC1900 Touch Screen Wi-Fi Gigabit Router
product_meta.description: Seamlessly stream 4K HD video and game online with the Touch P5's lightning-fast AC1900 Wi-Fi. Set up your network right on the dual band router's intuitive touchscreen display, eliminating the need for a separate PC, tablet, or smartphone. The Touch P5 includes apps for easily adding or removing devices from your network, modifying parental controls, and changing guest access privileges. Its three external antennas use high-powered amplifiers and Beam forming technology to provide superior coverage and reliability. Frequency Range: 2.4GHz and 5GHz Band; Interface Available: 4 x 10/100/1000Mbps LAN Ports , 1 10/100/1000Mbps WAN Port, 1 USB 3.0 Port + 1 USB 2.0 Port; Protocols Supported: Supports IPv4 and IPv6; System Requirement: Microsoft Windows 98SE NT 2000 XP Vista or Windows 7 8 8.1 10, Mac OS NetWare UNIX or Linux, Internet Explorer 11 Firefox 12.0 Chrome 20.0 Safari 4.0 or other Java-enabled browser, Cable or DSL Modem, Subscription with an Internet Service Provider (for Internet access)Windows 8 MAC OS NetWare UNIX or Linux; Wireless Standards: IEEE 802.11ac/n/a 5GHz, IEEE 802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz + 256QAM
feature_bullets: Upgrades networks to 802.11ac, the latest, most powerful Wi Fi technology
Blazing Wi Fi over 5GHz (1300Mbps) and 2.4GHz (600Mbps) bands for lag free 4K HD video streaming and online gaming
Intuitive touchscreen display for easy setup and network management
1GHz dual core processor handles multiple tasks at once without interruption
Beam forming focuses Wi Fi towards devices to form stronger connections.Subscription with an Internet Service Provider (for Internet access)Windows 8, MAC OS, NetWare, UNIX or Linux
Four gigabit Ethernet ports for lightning fast wired connections

specifications.Operating System: Microsoft Windows 98SE, NT, 2000, XP, Vista or Windows 7, 8, 8.1,10， Mac OS, NetWare, UNIX or Linux
